verses.verse: Now it came to pass in the thirtieth <WH7970> year <WH8141>, in the fourth <WH7243> month <WH2568>, in the fifth day of the month <WH2320>, as I was among <WH8432> the captives <WH1473> by the river <WH5104> of Chebar <WH3529>, that the heavens <WH8064> were opened <WH6605>, and I saw <WH7200> visions <WH4759> of God <WH430>.
In the fifth <WH2568> day of the month <WH2320>, which was the fifth <WH2549> year <WH8141> of king <WH4428> Jehoiachin <WH3112>'s captivity <WH1546>,

The word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came expressly unto Ezekiel <WH3168> the priest <WH3548>, the son <WH1121> of Buzi <WH941>, in the land <WH776> of the Chaldeans <WH3778> by the river <WH5104> Chebar <WH3529>; and the hand <WH3027> of the Lord was there upon him <WH3068>.

And I looked <WH7200>, and <WH7307>, behold, a whirlwind came <WH935> out of the north <WH6828>, a great <WH1419> cloud <WH6051>, and a fire <WH784> infolding <WH3947> itself <WH5051>, and a brightness was about <WH5439> it <WH8432>, and out of the midst there as the color <WH5869> of amber <WH2830>, out of the midst <WH8432> of the fire <WH784>.

Also out of the midst <WH8432> there came the likeness <WH1823> of four <WH702> living creatures <WH2416>. And this was their appearance <WH4758>; they <WH2007> had the likeness <WH1823> of a man <WH120>.
And every one <WH259> had four <WH702> faces <WH6440>, and every one <WH259> had four <WH702> wings <WH3671>.

And their feet <WH7272> were straight <WH3477> feet <WH7272>; and the sole <WH3709> of their feet <WH7272> was like the sole <WH3709> of a calf <WH5695>'s foot <WH7272>: and they sparkled <WH5340> like the color <WH5869> of burnished <WH7044> brass <WH5178>.
And they had the hands <WH3027> of a man <WH120> under their wings <WH3671> on their four <WH702> sides <WH7253>; and they four <WH702> had their faces <WH6440> and their wings <WH3671>.
Their wings <WH3671> were joined <WH2266> one <WH802> to another <WH269>; they turned <WH5437> not when they went <WH3212>; they went <WH3212> every one <WH376> straight <WH5676> forward <WH6440>.

As for the likeness <WH1823> of their faces <WH6440>, they four <WH702> had the face <WH6440> of a man <WH120>, and the face <WH6440> of a lion <WH738>, on the right side <WH3225>: and they four <WH702> had the face <WH6440> of a ox <WH7794> on the left side <WH8040>; they four <WH702> also had the face <WH6440> of a eagle <WH5404>.

Thus were their faces <WH6440>: and their wings <WH3671> were stretched <WH6504> upward <WH4605>; two <WH8147> wings of every one <WH376> were joined <WH2266> one <WH376> to another <WH376>, and two <WH8147> covered <WH3680> their bodies <WH1472>.
And they went <WH3212> every one <WH376> straight <WH5676> forward <WH6440>: where the spirit <WH7307> was to go <WH3212>, they went <WH3212>; and they turned <WH5437> not when they went <WH3212>.

As for the likeness <WH1823> of the living creatures <WH2416>, their appearance <WH4758> was like burning <WH1197> coals <WH1513> of fire <WH784>, and like the appearance <WH4758> of lamps <WH3940>: it went up and down <WH1980> among the living creatures <WH2416>; and the fire <WH784> was bright <WH5051>, and out of the fire <WH784> went forth <WH3318> lightning <WH1300>.
And the living creatures <WH2416> ran <WH7519> and returned <WH7725> as the appearance <WH4758> of a flash of lightning <WH965>.
Now as I looked <WH7200> the living creatures <WH2416>, behold one <WH259> wheel <WH212> upon the earth <WH776> by <WH681> the living creatures <WH2416>, with his four <WH702> faces <WH6440>.

The appearance <WH4758> of the wheels <WH212> and their work <WH4639> was like unto the color <WH5869> of a beryl <WH8658>: and they four <WH702> had one <WH259> likeness <WH1823>: and their appearance <WH4758> and their work <WH4639> was as it were a wheel <WH212> in the middle <WH8432> of a wheel <WH212>.
When they went <WH3212>, they went <WH3212> upon their four <WH702> sides <WH7253>: and they turned <WH5437> not when they went <WH3212>.
As for their rings <WH1354>, they were so high <WH1363> that they were dreadful <WH3374>; and their rings <WH1354> were full <WH4392> of eyes <WH5869> round about <WH5439> them four <WH702>.

And when the living creatures <WH2416> went <WH3212>, the wheels <WH212> went <WH3212> by them <WH681>: and when the living creatures <WH2416> were lifted up <WH5375> from the earth <WH776>, the wheels <WH212> were lifted up <WH5375>.

Wherever the spirit <WH7307> was to go <WH3212>, they went <WH3212>, there was their spirit <WH7307> to go <WH3212>; and the wheels <WH212> were lifted up <WH5375> over against <WH5980> them <WH7307>: for the spirit of the living creature <WH2416> was in the wheels <WH212>.

When those went <WH3212>, these went <WH3212>; and when those stood <WH5975>, these stood <WH5975>; and when those were lifted up <WH5375> from the earth <WH776>, the wheels <WH212> were lifted up <WH5375> over against <WH5980> them <WH7307>: for the spirit of the living creature <WH2416> was in the wheels <WH212>.

And the likeness <WH1823> of the firmament <WH7549> upon the heads <WH7218> of the living creature <WH2416> was as the color <WH5869> of the terrible <WH3372> crystal <WH7140>, stretched forth <WH5186> over their heads <WH7218> above <WH4605>.

And under the firmament <WH7549> were their wings <WH3671> straight <WH3477>, the one <WH802> toward the other <WH269>: every one <WH376> had two <WH8147>, which covered <WH3680> on this side <WH2007>, and every one <WH376> had two <WH8147>, which covered <WH3680> on that side <WH2007>, their bodies <WH1472>.

And when they went <WH3212>, I heard <WH8085> the noise <WH6963> of their wings <WH3671>, like the noise <WH6963> of great <WH7227> waters <WH4325>, as the voice <WH6963> of the Almighty <WH7706>, the voice <WH6963> of speech <WH1999>, as the noise <WH6963> of a army <WH4264>: when they stood <WH5975>, they let down <WH7503> their wings <WH3671>.
And there was a voice <WH6963> from the firmament <WH7549> that was over their heads <WH7218>, when they stood <WH5975>, and had let down <WH7503> their wings <WH3671>.

And above <WH4605> the firmament <WH7549> that was over their heads <WH7218> was the likeness <WH1823> of a throne <WH3678>, as the appearance <WH4758> of a sapphire <WH5601> stone <WH68>: and upon the likeness <WH1823> of the throne <WH3678> was the likeness <WH1823> as the appearance <WH4758> of a man <WH120> above upon it <WH4605>.

And I saw <WH7200> as the color <WH5869> of amber <WH2830>, as the appearance <WH4758> of fire <WH784> round about <WH5439> inside <WH1004> it <WH4758>, from the appearance of his body <WH4975> even upward <WH4605>, and from the appearance <WH4758> of his body <WH4975> even downward <WH4295>, I saw <WH7200> as it were the appearance <WH4758> of fire <WH784>, and it had brightness <WH5051> round about <WH5439>.

As the appearance <WH4758> of the bow <WH7198> that is in the cloud <WH6051> in the day <WH3117> of rain <WH1653>, so was the appearance <WH4758> of the brightness <WH5051> round about <WH5439>. This was the appearance <WH4758> of the likeness <WH1823> of the glory <WH3519> of the Lord <WH3068>. And when I saw <WH7200> it <WH5307>, I fell upon my face <WH6440>, and I heard <WH8085> a voice <WH6963> of one that spoke <WH1696>.
